item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

Where it says ‘if(NpcDialogue == 288){’
Change the “288” to what ever the number is when he says “You deserved that Rune platebody”[/quote]
Well uhm it needs to be at 288 But it also comes up at 287 :s

item.title: Quest reward glitch[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

dear moparscapers,

in my case 40 i have this code:

if(NpcDialogue == 288){ q2 = 15; qpoints += 5; showInterface(297); sendQuest("You have completed Dragon Slayer!", 301); sendQuest("@gre@DragonSlayer", 7342); sM("Oziach will sell me a rune platebody now.."); }

now when i talk to oziach. (for dragon slayer) i do 2 dialogues then the quest interface came up but it may not come then :s so i mean at dialogue 288 it already comes up.

vid:

halflive9
